cause.description:
All around the world people, young and old, pretty and, umm - not so pretty, gather round their television sets, radios and (they lucky few) Old Trafford to support the undoubtedly the greatest club in the world. This cause will unite those supporters, and, yah thats all I got! go Red devils!
1. Run by the greatest manager of all time
2. Home to footballs eternal legends
3. It's all just bloody good fun!
cause.mission: Unite the supporters of the Manchester United faithfull
cause.name: Manchester United
